00109 #ifndef _OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap_h
00110 #ifdef __GNUG__
00111 #pragma interface
00112 #endif
00113 #define _OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap_h 1
00114 
00115 typedef void* Pix;
00116 
00117 #include <agent_pp/oidx_defs.h>
00118 #include <agent_pp/mib_entry.h>
00119 
00120 #ifdef AGENTPP_NAMESPACE
00121 namespace Agentpp {
00122 #endif
00123 
00124 
00125 class AGENTPP_DECL OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap
00126 {
00127 protected:
00128   int                   count;
00129   MibEntryPtr                   def;
00130 
00131 public:
00132                         OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap(MibEntryPtr  dflt);
00133   inline virtual              ~OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap();
00134 
00135   int                   length() const; // current number of items
00136   int                   empty() const;
00137 
00138   virtual int           contains(OidxPtr  key);      // is key mapped?
00139 
00140   virtual void          clear();                 // delete all items
00141 
00142   virtual MibEntryPtr&          operator [] (OidxPtr  key) = 0; // access contents by key
00143 
00144   virtual void          del(OidxPtr  key) = 0;       // delete entry
00145 
00146   virtual Pix           first() = 0;             // Pix of first item or 0
00147   virtual void          next(Pix& i) = 0;        // advance to next or 0
00148   virtual OidxPtr&          key(Pix i) = 0;          // access key at i
00149   virtual MibEntryPtr&          contents(Pix i) = 0;     // access contents at i
00150 
00151   virtual int           owns(Pix i);             // is i a valid Pix  ?
00152   virtual Pix           seek(OidxPtr  key);          // Pix of key
00153 
00154   MibEntryPtr&                  dflt();                  // access default val
00155 
00156   void                  error(const char* msg);
00157   virtual int           OK() = 0;                // rep invariant
00158 };
00159 
00160 
00161 inline OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap::~OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap() {}
00162 
00163 inline int OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap::length() const
00164 {
00165   return count;
00166 }
00167 
00168 inline int OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap::empty() const
00169 {
00170   return count == 0;
00171 }
00172 
00173 inline MibEntryPtr& OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap::dflt()
00174 {
00175   return def;
00176 }
00177 
00178 inline OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap::OidxPtrMibEntryPtrMap(MibEntryPtr  dflt) :def(dflt)
00179 {
00180   count = 0;
00181 }
00182 
00183 #ifdef AGENTPP_NAMESPACE
00184 }
00185 #endif
00186 
00187 #endif
